name: Tuning Crystal Station
description: Utility Station: Double-click to set out a model of the Diverse Ledges, which allows players in the area to tune their weapons. Station stays active for five minutes.

details.name: Enhancement
details.description:
Gain Condition Damage Equal to 3% of Your Precision
Gain Condition Damage Equal to 8% of Your Expertise
+10% Experience from Kills
